name: Catch the Cell !!!
description:
A simple game made by one person during a one week game jam.

The jam came with the "one button" constraint, and with the theme "catch". 

The goal of the game is to catch the good cells among of group of cells.  If you catch the cell in the limited time, you can go to the next level ; if not, you go back to the previous level.

It was really hard to have a good idea with this theme, and such a hard constraint. Even one week was not enough to have a good concept for me, so I worked on a game that I could do in less than a week, but I designed  21 levels in order to have some content for you. So I hope it made me progress and that my next game jam games will be better.
